input.sentences: a drive across the country will hold many amazing sights .
depending on where you are your mood will be different .
the natural beauty of the scenery in certain places is amazing
dont look back in the rear view mirror just move forward .
when you finally do get home appreciate the experiences you had
output.sentences: We wanted to go for a drive to look a the sights yesterday.
We took the car out and all got in it.
We were looking for places of natural beauty.
I took a picture out the window, but the rear view mirror blocked some of it.
We finally arrived home after all our adventures and experiences.
